official-title.#text:
To extend the program of block grants to States for
		  temporary assistance for needy families and related programs through December
		  31, 2013.

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 1108(b) of the Social Security Act

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
) shall continue through December
			 31, 2013, in the manner authorized for fiscal year 2012, and out of any money
			 in the Treasury of the United States not otherwise appropriated, there are
			 hereby appropriated such sums as may be necessary for such purpose. Grants and
			 payments may be made pursuant to this authority on a quarterly basis through
			 the first quarter of fiscal year 2014 at the level provided for such activities
			 for the corresponding quarter of fiscal year 2012.
